name: Wait
natural_language_description: 这是 Wait 节点。主要用于: Wait before continue with execution

resume.name: resume
resume.description: Determines the waiting mode to use before the workflow continues
resume.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resume | 作用: Determines the waiting mode to use before the workflow continues | 默认值: timeInterval
available_options: After Time Interval (值: timeInterval) - Waits for a certain amount of time
At Specified Time (值: specificTime) - Waits until a specific date and time to continue
On Webhook Call (值: webhook) - Waits for a webhook call before continuing
On Form Submitted (值: form) - Waits for a form submission before continuing

incomingAuthentication.name: incomingAuthentication
incomingAuthentication.description: If and how incoming resume-webhook-requests to $execution.resumeUrl should be authenticated for additional security
incomingAuthentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: If and how incoming resume-webhook-requests to $execution.resumeUrl should be authenticated for additional security | 默认值: none

dateTime.name: dateTime
dateTime.description: The date and time to wait for before continuing
dateTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date and Time | 作用: The date and time to wait for before continuing | (必填项)

amount.name: amount
amount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Wait Amount | 作用: The time to wait | 默认值: 5

unit.name: unit
unit.description: The time unit of the Wait Amount value
unit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Wait Unit | 作用: The time unit of the Wait Amount value | 默认值: seconds

webhookNotice.displayName: The webhook URL will be generated at run time. It can be referenced with the $execution.resumeUrl variable. Send it somewhere before getting to this node. More info
webhookNotice.name: webhookNotice
webhookNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: The webhook URL will be generated at run time. It can be referenced with the $execution.resumeUrl variable. Send it somewhere before getting to this node. More info

formNotice.displayName: The form url will be generated at run time. It can be referenced with the $execution.resumeFormUrl variable. Send it somewhere before getting to this node. More info
formNotice.name: formNotice
formNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: The form url will be generated at run time. It can be referenced with the $execution.resumeFormUrl variable. Send it somewhere before getting to this node. More info

formTitle.name: formTitle
formTitle.description: Shown at the top of the form
formTitle.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Title | 作用: Shown at the top of the form | (必填项)

formDescription.name: formDescription
formDescription.description: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form. Accepts HTML.
formDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Description | 作用: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form. Accepts HTML.

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

responseMode.name: responseMode
responseMode.description: When and how to respond to the webhook
responseMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Respond | 作用: When and how to respond to the webhook | 默认值: onReceived
available_options: Immediately (值: onReceived) - As soon as this node executes
When Last Node Finishes (值: lastNode) - Returns data of the last-executed node
Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node (值: responseNode) - Response defined in that node

httpMethod.name: httpMethod
httpMethod.description: The HTTP method of the Webhook call
httpMethod.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTTP Method | 作用: The HTTP method of the Webhook call | 默认值: GET

responseCode.name: responseCode
responseCode.description: The HTTP Response code to return
responseCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Code | 作用: The HTTP Response code to return | 默认值: 200

responseData.name: responseData
responseData.description: What data should be returned. If it should return all items as an array or only the first item as object.
responseData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Data | 作用: What data should be returned. If it should return all items as an array or only the first item as object. | 默认值: firstEntryJson
available_options: All Entries (值: allEntries) - Returns all the entries of the last node. Always returns an array.
First Entry JSON (值: firstEntryJson) - Returns the JSON data of the first entry of the last node. Always returns a JSON object.
First Entry Binary (值: firstEntryBinary) - Returns the binary data of the first entry of the last node. Always returns a binary file.
No Response Body (值: noData) - Returns without a body

responseBinaryPropertyName.name: responseBinaryPropertyName
responseBinaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property to return
responseBinaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property to return | 默认值: data | (必填项)

limitWaitTime.name: limitWaitTime
limitWaitTime.description: Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes
limitWaitTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit Wait Time | 作用: Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes | 默认值: False

limitType.name: limitType
limitType.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.
limitType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit Type | 作用: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time. | 默认值: afterTimeInterval
available_options: After Time Interval (值: afterTimeInterval) - Waits for a certain amount of time
At Specified Time (值: atSpecifiedTime) - Waits until the set date and time to continue

resumeAmount.name: resumeAmount
resumeAmount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 作用: The time to wait | 默认值: 1

resumeUnit.name: resumeUnit
resumeUnit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Unit | 作用: Unit of the interval value | 默认值: hours

maxDateAndTime.name: maxDateAndTime
maxDateAndTime.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time
maxDateAndTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Date and Time | 作用: Continue execution after the specified date and time

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: appendAttribution (值: None) - Whether to include the link “Form automated with n8n” at the bottom of the form
webhookSuffix (值: None) - This suffix path will be appended to the restart URL. Helpful when using multiple wait nodes.
